name: Astrovoid (Zach!)
description:
The highly anticipated follow up to my first project, Falling Blocks, is finally here! Allow me to introduce Astrovoid. (I figured that since the objects that fall are diamonds now, it should have a different name...)

I've added a couple of items in this updated version — a start screen welcomes you with some instructions, a field of stars zooms past now for ~ambience~, some fun little particle effects thrown in for good measure, and now there's a little power up you can collect for five whole seconds of indestructibility. You're invincible, you're beautiful, you're Linda Evangelista! 

I might tinker with this project a little more before my brain says I'm finished with it, but for now I'm proud of the progress. More to come on other game projects soon!
